alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Iron (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 17 at 11:59PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A HEAVY SNOW SHOWER WILL AFFECT NORTHERN IRON AND CENTRAL ASHLAND COUNTIES... At 1158 PM CST, a heavy snow shower was over Gurney, or 16 miles west of Ironwood, moving southeast at 40 mph. Visibilities of 1/2 mile or less, wind gusts up to 35 mph, and rapid snow accumulation on roads are expected with this heavy snow shower. This heavy snow shower will be near... Upson around 1205 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this heavy snow shower include Kimball, Bad River Reservation, Marble Point, Saxon Harbor, Gile Flowage, Cedar, Franks Field, Island Lake Iron County, Pence, and Iron Belt. Be prepared for changing visibility and road conditions. Reduce your speed and allow more space between you and the vehicle in front of you.
